cooking_method: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices. Fry onions and garlic. Add mutton and cook until tender. Boil rice separately. Layer rice and mutton. Bake in oven for 30 minutes.

Marinate fish with turmeric powder and salt. Grind mustard seeds and green chilies to a paste. Fry fish in mustard oil until golden brown. Add the mustard paste and water. Cook until the gravy thickens.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Make small patties. Fry in oil until golden brown. Serve with mint chutney.
